alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:48PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central White Pine and southern Elko Counties through 315 PM PDT... At 247 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Ruby Lake, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central White Pine and southern Elko Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; White Pine County
